TieflingAdventurer.how_to_trigger: - Go to -16; 51; -52- Talk to the tiefling of the adventurer group.

TieflingAdventurer_0.speaker: Quinara
TieflingAdventurer_0.text: I ain't looking to make friends - or enemies. Go bother someone else.
TieflingAdventurer_0.context: NodeContext: trying to tell us to piss off as quietly and calmly as possible

TieflingAdventurer_1.speaker: Quinara
TieflingAdventurer_1.text: Off with you - I've bags to pack and blades to sharpen.
TieflingAdventurer_1.context: NodeContext: dismissing a stranger who has interrupted them

GnomeAdventurer_0.speaker: Yonks
GnomeAdventurer_0.text: If you are in the market for potions, I highly recommend The Velveteen Elixir. I've not been this well-stocked since Waterdeep.

GnomeAdventurer_1.speaker: Yonks
GnomeAdventurer_1.text: I wish I could have spent more time perusing the shops - but alas, it is time to move on. Such is the life of a daring adventurer!
GnomeAdventurer_1.context: NodeContext: very much sounds like he's trying to convince himself to be enthusiastic about leaving

AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_0.speaker: Sarafin
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_0.text: What's the rush, Zog? Can't we stay here for a bit?
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_0.context: NodeContext: a little bit pleading, but not too over the top

AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_3.speaker: Zog
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_3.text: With the Absolute's army on its way? Not a chance.

AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_9.speaker: Sarafin
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_9.text: What's the harm in one night? Think of it - actual beds. Pillows.

AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_7.speaker: Yonks
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_7.text: It would be most pleasing to sleep indoors for once...
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_7.context: NodeContext: thoughtful, almost convinced to stay in the city one more night

AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_13.speaker: Quinara
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_13.text: Zog said to leave, so we're leaving. End of story.

AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_5.speaker: Sarafin
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_5.text: The city's rumour mill is going mad - thieves, murderers, monsters. All hells breaking loose.

AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_6.speaker: Sarafin
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_6.text: Are you joking? This is great! Think of all the work we can get here!

AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_10.speaker: Zog
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_10.text: Woah, hold on - there will be plenty of work in Neverwinter. Safer work.
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_10.context: NodeContext: trying to calm an excitable colleague.

AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_11.speaker: Zog
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_11.text: How are we fixed on supplies? Sound off.
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_11.context: NodeContext: talking to his gang - they're all close by so not shouting.

AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_12.speaker: Sarafin
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_12.text: Got camp bits and bobs from Danthelon's Dancing Axe.
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_12.context: NodeContext: reporting what they bought for the journey ahead, and where from

AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_2.speaker: Yonks
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_2.text: I have secured a most excellent supply of potions from The Velveteen Elixir!
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_2.context: NodeContext: reporting what they bought for the journey ahead, and where from

AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_8.speaker: Quinara
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_8.context: NodeContext: reporting what they bought for the journey ahead, and where from

AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_1.speaker: Zog
AD_AdventurerLeavingChat_1.text: Good job, gang. That should last us the journey.

ElfAdventurer_0.speaker: Sarafin
ElfAdventurer_0.text: You look like you need to clean off the road-dirt almost as much as I do. No good inns with hot water and a tub on this side of the Crossing though.

ElfAdventurer_1.speaker: Sarafin
ElfAdventurer_1.text: If you've ever considered bathing in the Chionthar, don't. I tried it once, and came out dirtier than I was when I went in.

HalfOrcAdventurer_0.speaker: Zog
HalfOrcAdventurer_0.text: Thought we'd get something steady here, but no coin is worth it - not with the Absolute breathing down our necks.

HalfOrcAdventurer_1.speaker: Zog
HalfOrcAdventurer_1.text: If you're after a job, Neverwinter is on the look-out for adventurers. That's where we're headed.
